name: Eli Mills
description: He was a businessman who was in charge of theLockwood Estate's fortune on behalf ofSir Benjamin Lockwood. Mills secretly sought to save thedinosaursfromIsla Nublarin order tosellthem to the highest bidders and also backed the creation of theIndoraptor, a weaponized prototype hybrid dinosaurs that Mills sought to be the start of further dinosaur weapons. However, his plans were thwarted by members of theDinosaur Protection Groupwho freed the dinosaurs and Mills himself was later killed and eat...

attributes.Appearances: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous (mentioned) Jurassic World: Aftermath (mentioned

name: Howard King
description: Dr. Howard Kingwas an employee ofBiosyn. He was a biologist, who lost his credibility when his research on blood-coagulation factors failed and funding removed. He later served as an assistant to Dr.Lewis Dodgson.

name: Dinosaur Handler
description: Thispark workerwas one of the many dinosaur handlers onIsla NublarinJurassic Worldresponsible for herdingParasaurolophus,Sinoceratops,Apatosaurus,AnkylosaurusandStegosaurusto better feeding grounds in the park.

name: McNally
description: McNally and his partner Jones were hired by local ranchers in the Gibson Peak area to deal with the raptor, Blue who had been killing livestock and destroying property. They were expected to have completed the job by friday. While in the woods they were observed byMaisie Lockwoodand Violet Moody who overheard them discussing their plans. McNally convinced Jones to without their bosses knowledge kill the twoTriceratopsthey sighted earlier and sell their horns on the market as well as bag Blue ...

name: Father of Three
description: TheFather of Threewas a tourist atJurassic World. He was with his three children onMain Streetwhen the tourists were attacked byDimorphodonsandPteranodons. He is alive but is not seen for the rest of the movie.

name: Beverly
description: Beverly was first mentioned when she told Dr. Malcolm a package has arrived from him via DHL. She was a very helpful assistant as he rested against his desk, she help unwrap the package. She also help contact doctorsElizabeth GelmanandRichard Levinefor Malcolm upon his request.Later, she told him she could not get through to Levine via his office phone. She also informed him that photographers from a magazine calledChaos Quarterlycame to photograph his whole office including the map of possib...

name: Ron Thompson
description: Ron Thompsonis a public relations specialist who worked atInGen.

name: Ajay Sidhu
description: Ajay Sidhuwas a hunter of Indian descent, a member of thehunterteam andRoland Tembo's best friend inThe Lost World: Jurassic Park.

name: Diego
description: He knew the outline of the island very well as he visited it previously as a young boy. He carried most of the equipment as they climbed up one of the cliffs to get on the island. He was amazed by even the smallest dinosaurs. Levine considered him sloppy and careless, such as making too much noise or smoking when he had been specifically told not to. Diego was dragged into the bushes and was killed by aCarnotaurus.Levine only noted which kind of dinosaur killed Diego later on.

name: David Vaughn
description: David Vaughnis the main character inJurassic Park: Survival. He is a security technician. In the game he rescues various scientists from dinosaurs. The game never finished though.

name: Gia
description: Benfirst mentions her whenYasminadoesn't answer any ofSammy's messages or calls. Sammy is nervous about that, so Ben tries calming her down. She says that he'd do the same thing if he had a girlfriend, and he said he has one but he hasn't done it. Everyone is shocked that he has a girlfriend and acts like they're just happy for him and totally expected him to have one, and he states she lives in Europe.

name: Brandon Marc Higa
description: Brandon Marc HigaOccupationVeterinarianBrandon Marc Higawas a veterinarian working with theIsla NublarVeterinary Services team. His immediate supervisor was Dr.Suzanne de Lange, a palaeoveterinarian.

name: Sam
description: Samis the survivor of the events of Jurassic World: Aftermath, and is controlled by the player. Sam is guided byAmelia Everett, better known as Mia, through out the game.SamJurassic World: Aftermath's logoAppearancesJurassic World: AftermathSpeciesHumanRoleMercenarySecurity ExpertStatusAliveGame AppearancesJurassic World: Aftermath

name: Junior/Comics
description: The baby rex appears in 3/4 of the comic adaptions of The Lost World Jurassic Park. Its first appearance is in the nest, feasting on the rotting leg of some unknown creature when it is spotted byRoland TemboandAjay Sidhu. The two hunters take the baby Rex back to camp to wear Roland chains it up to a wooden post to lure the adult into his rifle sites.

name: Junior/Games
description: In all of his game appearances (exceptJurassic World: Alive), Junior is depicted with brown scales like his mother. This is due to Junior being planned to look like this in early development of the film.

attributes.Appearances: Chaos Island: The Lost World The Lost World: Jurassic Park (arcade) LEGO Jurassic World Jurassic World: Alive

name: Mrs. Fadoula
description: She is first seen as a picture in season four that her daughter drew of her at some point (although Yaz is known to have been dreaming). Mrs. Fadoula seems to have a good relationship with her daughter as Yasmina says she misses her. According to Yasmina, it was her mother who taught her how to play poker.

name: George Lambert
description: George Lambertis the head of the Security Division inJurassic World: EvolutionandJurassic World Evolution 2. He will assist you throughout the entire game.

attributes.Appearances: Jurassic World Evolution Jurassic World Evolution 2

name: Conrad Hawksley
description: Description non trouvée.

name: Screaming Woman (Lockwood Manor)
description: WhileStiggywent on a rampage in the auction room causing panic among the bidders, she at one point, ran right behind the dinosaur trying to find some avenue of escape. Whilst most of the other bidders managed escaped the mansion unhurt, the woman and two other bidders hid in the elevator, unable to get it working since they didn't know the code but at the same time being too scared to move otherwise.

name: Steven Paul
description: Steven PaulGenderMaleRoleMasrani Global CorporationemployeeSteven Paulis aMasrani Global Corporationemployee who formerly worked as a park Inspector atJurassic Worldafter completing an internship for the company.

name: Mr. Parker
description: Mr. Parker employed Martin Krebs to retrieve blood from the largest dinosaurs to create a cure for heart disease. He is the owner of Parker-Genix.

name: Cathy Bowman
description: Cathy Bowman was the excited young girl who explored the beach onIsla Sorna. She was portrayed as a British girl coming from a wealthy family that was vacationing on a yacht cruise. As she wandered throughout the beach, she came upon aCompsognathus. When she went to feed theCompsognathusa little piece of her food, the others suddenly came out from the grass, had surrounded and had attacked her. Her parents,PaulandDeirdre Bowman, and the crew of their yacht heard her screams and ran to her aid...

attributes.Appearances: Jurassic Park (novel) The Lost World: Jurassic Park Jurassic Park: Trespasser

name: Art
description: ArtAppearancesThe Evolution of ClaireSpeciesHumanGenderMaleRoleIntern forBright Minds

name: Roland Tembo
description: Roland Tembowas a big game hunter fromMombasa, Kenyaand widely regarded as the best of the best, and the secondary antagonist turned anti-hero ofThe Lost World: Jurassic Park. He was chosen byPeter Ludlowto be the team leader of his expedition toIsla Sornato capturedinosaurs. Although he originally turned down the invitation, he agreed after when Ludlow offered him the chance to hunt amaleTyrannosaurus rex. After being asked to stay permanently and help run the plannedSan Diegodinosaur park, ...

name: Lex Murphy/Comics
description: Lex Murphy, like most of the cast from the original film, is one of the recurring characters within the comic series. However, Lex and her brother’s inclusion is rather minor, but no less significant. Only appearing in two of the comics being the first and second to last comics produced under the Jurassic Park license.

name: Delgado
description: CongresswomanDelgadowas a United States congresswoman whoClaire Dearingtried to persuade to raise support for theDinosaur Protection Group. She asked Delgado if she wanted her children to grow up in a world without dinosaurs. Although she was successful at winning Congresswoman Delgado's support, immediately after hanging up with her, Claire saw thecommittee chairmanon TV announce that the US would not intervene onIsla Nublar.

name: Junior
description: AppearancesThe Lost World: Jurassic ParkSpeciesTyrannosaurus rexGenderMaleStatusUnknownFamilySee belowBorn1997Game AppearancesSee hereToy AppearancesSee hereComics AppearancesSee here

name: Rebecca Ryan
description: Rebecca Ryan is a news reporter, she reported news about a singleMosasaurusattacking a beach inHawaii. In her way home she spoke to her husband, telling him to keep the kids safe until she gets there. At home she tells them they've seen enough of the news, without her knowledge, her husband was nearly attacked by anTriceratopsand aAnkylosaurus, luckily he escaped in time.

attributes.Appearances: A Rising Tide Dinosaur Crossing The Roar That Rules It All Dinosaur Territory: Proceed With Caution

name: Rexy/Novels
description: The femaleTyrannosaurus rexthat appeared in the firstJurassic Parknovelis never called by a given name, howeverRobert Muldoonnicknames her"Rexy"on multiple occasions in thefirst novel, but he was doing it to be derogatory about her.This is similar to howthe Big One, aVelociraptor, is also based on a nickname and not a given name in the franchise.

name: Cruz
description: InJurassic Parkhe treatedTina Bowman's wounds and allergic reaction from her encounter with aProcompsognathus. He found the reaction very strange, therefore called his friendMartin "Marty" Guitierrez(who is a biologist from Yale working in Costa Rica) for advice.

name: Leon
description: Leon was new, having replaced another worker who'd either been injured or killed while tending to the animals. He was on duty whenVic Hoskinswas watchingOwen Gradyworking with hisVelociraptors. When a pig used to feed the raptors got loose inside the pen, Leon attempted to use a noose on the end of a long pole to retrieve the animal before the raptors ate it. He was too late. Although he got the noose around the pig's neck,Echosnatched the pig and jerked it away. Leon, holding onto the pole, ...

name: Kadasha
description: KadashaAppearancesBattle at Big RockSpeciesHumanPortrayed byMelody HurdRoleProtagonistStatusAliveFamilyDennis(father)Mariana(stepmother)Mateo(stepbrother)Unnamed Half-brother

name: Josh (Gyrosphere Operator)
description: He seemed exceedingly bored with his job and extremely inattentive. He didn't seem used to dealing with angry crowds. When the visitors became irate with him when he told them the ride was closed, Josh was forced to consult an employee guidebook in an effort to figure out how to deal with the situation. Nevertheless, he seemed to grasp the seriousness of thesituationand didn't handle it flippantly despite his earlier boredom.

name: Sarr
description: Dr. Sarr's personality is characterized by arrogance, as he believes himself superior to those around him, including his employer, Soyona Santos. He exhibits sadistic tendencies, demonstrated by his willingness to feed his crew to the genetically modifiedBaryonyx, revealing a cruel and malicious nature. Sarr is also prideful, taking great satisfaction in his scientific achievements, particularly in creating the echolocatingBaryonyx, which he views as a testament to his abilities.

name: Vic Hoskins/Games
description: Hoskins appears in theLEGO Jurassic Worldvideo game retaining the role he had in the film as an antagonistic character. Unlike the film however, does not die; instead one of the raptors replaces various limbs with random assorted Lego pieces. It is never made clear what happens to him afterward.

attributes.Appearances: Jurassic World: The Game LEGO Jurassic World Jurassic World: Aftermath (mentioned

name: LaDonna Belvedere
description: A scientist who studies animals in their habitats; Dr. LaDonna Belvedere, with Biosyn funding, releases a gorilla into unfamiliar surroundings (the Colombian jungle) but comes across theVelociraptors“Alf” and “Celia”. She watches them and learns their body-language; when she confronts them, she uses their body signs, and they accept her presence. Eventually, she is confronted byDr. Jeremiah Fischerto start a new, Biosyn-headed Jurassic Park, and reluctantly accepts his offer of being head-kee...

name: Jack (Macaw)
description: Not much is known about Jack's personality, as he does not have any lines in the film. In a scrapped line from the film, Jack curses at a statement made by Dr.Alan Grant. This could suggest that Jack is quite a rude bird, although this may also be because eitherEllieorMark Deglerhad taught the bird to say such a phrase.

attributes.Family: Ellie Sattler (former owner; possible owner as of 2022) Mark Degler (former owner; possible owner as of 2022) Charlie Degler (former owner; possible owner as of 2022) Unnamed Degler Child (former o...

name: Greg
description: Gregwas a man camping out atBig Rock National Park. He owned a crossbow, which he taughtKadashahow to use, much to her fatherDennis' displeasure. When a group ofNasutoceratopsinvaded the group's campsite, Greg hid in his camper van. This ended up saving his life when aOne-EyedAllosaurusappeared and attacked theNasutoceratopsfamily, then turned its wrath on the trailer with Dennis' family inside. But thanks to Greg teaching Kadasha how to use his crossbow, she was able to retrieve it and use i...

name: Angel
description: Angel is a highly-tinted-blue-skinned herbivorous hybrid ofSpinosaurusandSinoceratops, acquiring traits from both, like the sail of theSpinosaurus. She andher brotherwere designed to live in cold weather as they are able to generate their own heat.

name: John Roxton
description: He is mentioned as having adig siteinMongolia.He put forth a controversial theory that aTyrannosauruscould not see motionless objects after building casts of their heads and concluding they had a brain the size of a frog.This was later disproved in the same novel by Dr.Richard Levine.

name: Gerry Harding
description: Gerry Harding is recognized by his greenInGenuniform. He has been married multiple times. He has two daughters,Jess HardingandSarah Harding. He and his daughter Jess were present at the park; during the1993 Isla Nublar Incident. But both of them had managed to escape theisland.

attributes.Appearances: Jurassic Park Jurassic Park (SEGA CD Game) (mentioned only) Jurassic Park: The Game
attributes.Family: Sarah Harding (daughter) Jessica Harding (daughter) Wallace Harding (brother or brother-in-law) Mrs. Harding (wife) Unnamed ex-wife
